snippet: Deutsche Bank's supervisory board will meet on Sunday to discuss plans for a potential capital increase of around 8 billion euros ($8.5 billion), two sources familiar with the matter said on Saturday....

headline.main: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports
headline.print_headline: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports

lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank's supervisory board will meet on Sunday to discuss plans for a potential capital increase of around 8 billion euros ($8.5 billion), two sources familiar with the matter said on Saturday.
